text: It's a tragic day today in Johannesburg. Thanks goes to @JMPDSafety @OUTsurance and all emergency services heroes out there #BridgeCollapse
When a bridge collapses, the elites lose few rands and people involved lose lives, sad reality #BridgeCollapse
Well done @Sefara_Mak and mayor @ParksTauCOJ for a well coordinated communication approach around this bridge collapse.
This is why Engineers are heavily regulated, and must be registered... #BridgeCollapse
